        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>getLanguageDetectors</h4> <pre>public static&nbsp;<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/List.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.util">List</a>&lt;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageDetector.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageDetector</a>&gt;&nbsp;getLanguageDetectors(<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/config/ServiceLoader.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.config">ServiceLoader</a>&nbsp;loader)</pre> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="isMixedLanguages--"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>isMixedLanguages</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;boolean&nbsp;isMixedLanguages()</pre> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="setMixedLanguages-boolean-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>setMixedLanguages</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageDetector.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageDetector</a>&nbsp;setMixedLanguages(boolean&nbsp;mixedLanguages)</pre> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="isShortText--"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>isShortText</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;boolean&nbsp;isShortText()</pre> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="setShortText-boolean-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>setShortText</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageDetector.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageDetector</a>&nbsp;setShortText(boolean&nbsp;shortText)</pre> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="loadModels--"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>loadModels</h4> <pre>public abstract&nbsp;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageDetector.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageDetector</a>&nbsp;loadModels()
                                     throws <a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/IOException.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.io">IOException</a></pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Load (or re-load) all available language models. This must be called after any settings that would impact the models being loaded (e.g. mixed language/short text), but before any of the document processing routines (below) are called. Note that it only needs to be called once.
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            this
           </dd> 
           <dt>
            <span class="throwsLabel">Throws:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code><a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/IOException.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.io">IOException</a></code>
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="loadModels-java.util.Set-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>loadModels</h4> <pre>public abstract&nbsp;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageDetector.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageDetector</a>&nbsp;loadModels(<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/Set.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.util">Set</a>&lt;<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/String.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">String</a>&gt;&nbsp;languages)
                                     throws <a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/IOException.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.io">IOException</a></pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Load (or re-load) the models specified in 
           <languages>
            . These use the ISO 639-1 names, with an optional "-
            <country code>
             " for more specific specification (e.g. "zh-CN" for Chinese in China).
            </country>
           </languages>
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="paramLabel">Parameters:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code>languages</code> - list of target languages.
           </dd> 
           <dt>
            <span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            this
           </dd> 
           <dt>
            <span class="throwsLabel">Throws:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code><a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/IOException.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.io">IOException</a></code>
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="hasModel-java.lang.String-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>hasModel</h4> <pre>public abstract&nbsp;boolean&nbsp;hasModel(<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/String.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">String</a>&nbsp;language)</pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Provide information about whether a model exists for a specific language.
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="paramLabel">Parameters:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code>language</code> - ISO 639-1 name for language
           </dd> 
           <dt>
            <span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            true if a model for this language exists.
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="setPriors-java.util.Map-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>setPriors</h4> <pre>public abstract&nbsp;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageDetector.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageDetector</a>&nbsp;setPriors(<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/Map.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.util">Map</a>&lt;<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/String.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">String</a>,<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/Float.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">Float</a>&gt;&nbsp;languageProbabilities)
                                    throws <a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/IOException.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.io">IOException</a></pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Set the a-priori probabilities for these languages. The provided map uses the language as the key, and the probability (0.0 &gt; probability &lt; 1.0) of text being in that language. Note that if the probabilities don't sum to 1.0, these values will be normalized. If hasModel() returns false for any of the languages, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. Use of these probabilities is detector-specific, and thus might not impact the results at all. As such, these should be viewed as a hint.
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="paramLabel">Parameters:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code>languageProbabilities</code> - Map from language to probability
           </dd> 
           <dt>
            <span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            this
           </dd> 
           <dt>
            <span class="throwsLabel">Throws:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code><a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/io/IOException.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.io">IOException</a></code>
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="reset--"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>reset</h4> <pre>public abstract&nbsp;void&nbsp;reset()</pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Reset statistics about the current document being processed
          </div> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="addText-char:A-int-int-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>addText</h4> <pre>public abstract&nbsp;void&nbsp;addText(char[]&nbsp;cbuf,
                             int&nbsp;off,
                             int&nbsp;len)</pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Add statistics about this text for the current document. Note that we assume an implicit word break exists before/after each of these runs of text.
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="paramLabel">Parameters:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code>cbuf</code> - Character buffer
           </dd> 
           <dd>
            <code>off</code> - Offset into cbuf to first character in the run of text
           </dd> 
           <dd>
            <code>len</code> - Number of characters in the run of text.
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="addText-java.lang.CharSequence-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>addText</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;void&nbsp;addText(<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/CharSequence.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">CharSequence</a>&nbsp;text)</pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Add 
           <text>
             to the statistics being accumulated for the current document. Note that this is a default implementation for adding a string (not optimized)
           </text>
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="paramLabel">Parameters:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code>text</code> - Characters to add to current statistics.
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="hasEnoughText--"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>hasEnoughText</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;boolean&nbsp;hasEnoughText()</pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Tell the caller whether more text is required for the current document before the language can be reliably detected. Implementations can override this to do early termination of stats collection, which can improve performance with longer documents. Note that detect() can be called even when this returns false
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            true if we have enough text for reliable detection.
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="detectAll--"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>detectAll</h4> <pre>public abstract&nbsp;<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/List.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.util">List</a>&lt;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageResult.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageResult</a>&gt;&nbsp;detectAll()</pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Detect languages based on previously submitted text (via addText calls).
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            list of all possible languages with at least medium confidence, sorted by confidence from highest to lowest. There will always be at least one result, which might have a confidence of NONE.
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="detect--"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>detect</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageResult.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageResult</a>&nbsp;detect()</pre> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="detectAll-java.lang.String-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockList"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>detectAll</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/util/List.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.util">List</a>&lt;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageResult.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageResult</a>&gt;&nbsp;detectAll(<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/String.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">String</a>&nbsp;text)</pre> 
          <div class="block">
           Utility wrapper that detects the language of a given chunk of text.
          </div> 
          <dl> 
           <dt>
            <span class="paramLabel">Parameters:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            <code>text</code> - String to add to current statistics.
           </dd> 
           <dt>
            <span class="returnLabel">Returns:</span>
           </dt> 
           <dd>
            list of all possible languages with at least medium confidence, sorted by confidence from highest to lowest.
           </dd> 
          </dl> </li> 
        </ul> <a name="detect-java.lang.CharSequence-"> 
         <!--   --> </a> 
        <ul class="blockListLast"> 
         <li class="blockList"> <h4>detect</h4> <pre>public&nbsp;<a href="../../../../../org/apache/tika/language/detect/LanguageResult.html" title="class in org.apache.tika.language.detect">LanguageResult</a>&nbsp;detect(<a href="http://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/CharSequence.html?is-external=true" title="class or interface in java.lang">CharSequence</a>&nbsp;text)</pre> </li> 
        </ul> </li> 
      </ul> </li> 
    </ul> 
   </div> 
  </div>
